title: Where can I view the 4G traffic?
answer:
1.         On the home screen, touch **Phone Manager**.

2.         Touch **Traffic manager** > **4G use** to view your used 4G traffic.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131128510001.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131128943002.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131128202003.jpg)

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150707131128944004.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
